sent.orig: Through the introduction of CAR component technique operating system, we could find many advantages of CAR.
sent.trans: 另外，为了提供最大的兼容性，可以利用CAR构件技术来移植各种流行的应用平台。

sent.orig: It is already embroiled in existing conflicts in both Chad and the CAR, another former possession.
sent.trans: 在Chad和CAR中它都被叛卷进了现在的纠纷中，CAR是他的另一个早期的财产。

sent.orig: Clearly describe the origin of CAR component and the meaning of application on smart phone.
sent.trans: 清晰地介绍了CAR构件的由来，以及在智能手机上应用的意义。

sent.orig: France has, for instance, been using special forces to fight rebels in the CAR's north-east.
sent.trans: 法国人马上派遣专门的力量平定叛军，在CAR的东北部。

sent.orig: Wireless devices also include in-car systems and traditional phones using voice technology.
sent.trans: 无线设备还包括使用语音技术的车载(in-car) 系统和传统电话。
